title: Junior Data Engineer
description:
IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa)
   

  

 India
   

  

 LIXIL INDIA PVT LTD
   

  

 Employee Assignment
   

  

 Fully remote possible
   

  

 Full Time

**Title:** 
**Data Engineer**
**Overview**
 A Data Engineer plays a crucial role in designing, building, and maintaining the infrastructure that powers our data\\-driven decisions. Youâ€™ll be at the heart of our data ecosystem, ensuring data is reliably collected, stored, and processed to provide clean, accessible data for our analytics and business intelligence teams.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design \\& Develop Data Pipelines: Assist in building, maintaining, and optimizing scalable ETL/ELT data pipelines to ingest and transform large datasets from diverse sources, including APIs, databases, and third\\-party systems.
* Data Modeling \\& Warehousing: Support the development of robust data models and schemas in both relational and cloud\\-native data warehouses (e.g., Google BigQuery).
* Ensure Data Integrity: Monitor, troubleshoot, and improve the performance and reliability of data pipelines, ensuring data quality, consistency, and accuracy.
* Data Source Integration: Work with various data formats and sources, including structured, semi\\-structured, and streaming data.
* Data Governance \\& Security: Collaborate with senior engineers to enforce data governance, quality, and security standards across the organization.
* Code \\& Automation: Write clean, efficient, and well\\-documented code (SQL, Python) for data engineering tasks. Utilize Git and CI/CD principles for version control and automated deployments.
* Team Collaboration: Document data workflows and contribute to a shared knowledge base, providing ad\\-hoc support to data analysts and business users.


**Required Skills \\& Experience**
* Educational Background: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or a related field.
* Professional Experience: 1\\-3 years of hands\\-on experience in a data engineering or similar role.
* Technical Proficiency:
* Communication \\& Soft Skills:
* Availability: Able to join immediately.

Our comprehensive services range from website development to sales support, aimed at driving business growth and operational excellence. We are committed to helping businesses succeed in the dynamic and evolving digital landscape.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a full\\-time hybrid role for a MERN Stack Developer based in New Delhi, allowing a combination of on\\-site work and some work\\-from\\-home flexibility. The MERN Stack Developer will handle both back\\-end and front\\-end development tasks, contribute to software and full\\-stack development projects, and ensure the creation of functional, user\\-friendly web applications. Responsibilities include writing clean code, debugging, collaborating with team members, and ensuring project deadlines are met with high\\-quality deliverables.

* Experience with Front\\-End Development, particularly React.js, JavaScript, and CSS

title: AI Automation
description:
**Company Description** 




 Zoft.ai is an innovative AI\\-powered SaaS platform focused on transforming customer service with intelligent chat and voice agents. The platform leverages cutting\\-edge technology to provide personalized support while effectively managing complex actions and workflows. Zoft.ai is dedicated to ensuring efficient and seamless customer interactions, helping businesses enhance their customer experiences. The company's solutions are designed to deliver exceptional service and operational efficiency across industries.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full\\-time remote role for a Data Science \\& Backend Engineer specializing in trading systems. As part of this role, you will design, develop, and maintain backend systems and APIs to support trade processing and analytics. You will implement data algorithms, conduct performance optimizations, and collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to design seamless trading system solutions. The role also involves ensuring the scalability and reliability of systems and integrating both back\\-end and front\\-end functionality.
 



  





 We are looking for a math\\-strong backend engineer (freshers or experienced candidates) to join our investment company in Chennai.
   





**About the JOB:** 




  





 We are seeking an
 **Agentic AI \\& n8n Automation Expert** 
 to design, build, and scale
 **intelligent, autonomous workflows** 
 across multiple business functions.
 



 This role goes beyond basic no\\-code automation. You will work on
 **agent\\-driven systems** 
 ,
 **LLM orchestration** 
 , and
 **end\\-to\\-end process automation** 
 that connects AI reasoning with real\\-world actions via APIs and workflows.
 



 If you enjoy building systems that
 **think, decide, and act automatically** 
 , this role is for you.
   





**Automation \\& Workflow Engineering** 



* Design and build
 **advanced n8n workflows** 
 including multi\\-step, conditional, branching, and event\\-driven automations
* Create
 **end\\-to\\-end automations** 
 spanning CRM, email, databases, internal tools, and external SaaS platforms
* Implement robust
 **error handling, retries, logging, and monitoring** 
 for production\\-grade workflows



  





**Agentic AI \\& LLM Systems** 



* Develop
 **LLM\\-powered agent workflows** 
 that can reason, plan, and execute tasks autonomously
* Implement
 **multi\\-agent and tool\\-using AI systems** 
 using orchestration frameworks
* Build
 **RAG (Retrieval\\-Augmented Generation)** 
 pipelines using vector databases such as
 **Pinecone, Chroma, or Weaviate**
* Integrate external systems using
 **REST APIs, Webhooks, OAuth, and custom authentication**
* **Design custom logic for data transformation, enrichment, and decision\\-making**
* **Connect AI systems to real\\-world actions (ticket creation, messaging, updates, approvals, triggers)**


* Continuously
 **optimize workflows** 
 for performance, cost, reliability, and scalability
* Collaborate with
 **product, engineering, and operations teams** 
 to identify automation opportunities
* Document workflows, architecture decisions, and best practices clearly



**Preferred to have** 



* **2\\+ years hands\\-on experience** 
 with n8n, Zapier, Make, or similar automation platforms
* **1\\+ year experience** 
 building AI\\-driven or LLM\\-based automations
* Strong understanding of:
* REST APIs, JSON, Webhooks
* Authentication (OAuth, API keys, tokens)
* Workflow orchestration and event\\-driven systems
* Experience working with
 **vector databases** 
 for AI retrieval workflows



  

  





**Good to have** 



* Python or JavaScript for custom scripting and extensions
* Experience with
 **Power Automate** 
 , or other orchestration tools
* Familiarity with AI tooling such as:
* OpenAI / Anthropic APIs
* LangChain, LlamaIndex, or similar frameworks
* Knowledge of cloud environments (AWS / GCP)



**Why join us** 



* Work on
 **cutting\\-edge Agentic AI systems**
* **Build automations that run real business operations end\\-to\\-end**
* **High ownership, high impact role**
* **Opportunity to shape how AI agents interact with production systems**

title: Data Engineer
description:
IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa)
   

  

 India
   

  

 LIXIL INDIA PVT LTD
   

  

 Employee Assignment
   

  

 Fully remote possible
   

  

 Full Time
   

  

 1 May 2025
   

  

**Title**
 Data Engineer
   

  

**Job Description**
 A Data Engineer is responsible for designing, building, and maintaining large\\-scale data systems and infrastructure. Their primary goal is to ensure that data is properly collected, stored, processed, and retrieved to support business intelligence, analytics, and data\\-driven decision\\-making.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and Develop Data Pipelines: Create data pipelines to extract data from various sources, transform it into a standardized format, and load it into a centralized data repository.
* Build and Maintain Data Infrastructure: Design, implement, and manage data warehouses, data lakes, and other data storage solutions.
* Ensure Data Quality and Integrity: Develop data validation, cleansing, and normalization processes to ensure data accuracy and consistency.
* Collaborate with Data Analysts and Business Process Owners: Work with data analysts and business process owners to understand their data requirements and provide data support for their projects.
* Optimize Data Systems for Performance: Continuously monitor and optimize data systems for performance, scalability, and reliability.
* Develop and Maintain Data Governance Policies: Create and enforce data governance policies to ensure data security, compliance, and regulatory requirements.


**Experience \\& Skills**
* Hands\\-on experience in implementing, supporting, and administering modern cloud\\-based data solutions (Google BigQuery, AWS Redshift, Azure Synapse, Snowflake, etc.).
* Strong programming skills in SQL, Java, and Python.
* Experience in configuring and managing data pipelines using Apache Airflow, Informatica, Talend, SAP BODS or API\\-based extraction.
* Expertise in real\\-time data processing frameworks.
* Strong understanding of Git and CI/CD for automated deployment and version control.

title: Principal Software Engineer
description:
At ABB, we help industries outrun \\- leaner and cleaner. Here, progress is an expectation \\- for you, your team, and the world. As a global market leader, weâ€™ll give you what you need to make it happen. It wonâ€™t always be easy, growing takes grit. But at ABB, youâ€™ll never run alone. Run what runs the world.
   

  

 This Position reports to:
   

  

 Digital Solution Engineering Manager
   

  

  

  

  

  

**What We Believe In**
 ABBâ€™s Process Automation business area enables customers to operate some of the worldâ€™s largest and most complex industrial infrastructures, helping them outrun â€“ leaner and cleaner.
   

  

 We offer a broad range of automation, electrification and digital solutions for process, hybrid and maritime industries, including industry\\-specific integrated control and software as well as measurement and analytics solutions and services.
   

  

  

**Your Role And Responsibilities**
 The Lead (QE) for PA Core will serve as a dynamic techno\\-functional leader dedicated to enhancing the Quality Engineering framework across DataOps, Edge, Visualization, Packaging, and IAM within ABB Genix. The role is accountable for shaping automation\\-first practices, embedding QE in CI/CD pipelines, and ensuring governance and reusability across platform and customer project validations.
   

  

 This position requires both technical depth and leadership capability â€“ guiding teams, cross\\-functional stakeholders, and ensuring that PA Core QE becomes the foundation of trust for Genix APM and customer solutions.
   

  

 The work model for the role is: Hybrid
   

  

**You will be mainly accountable for:**
* Define and own the QE strategy across PA Core areas (DataOps, Edge, Visualization, Packaging, IAM) while establishing governance for functional, non\\-functional, and regression coverage.
* Implement the adoption of automation\\-first and shift\\-left practices, embedding CI/CD\\-integrated testing and continuous quality validation.
* Coordinate the development and recycling of Golden Test Packs and acceptance packs, working with Platform, APM, and Domain teams to align QE outcomes with business KPIs.
* Mentor QE engineers to build a high\\-performance, specialist\\-driven culture while ensuring compliance, security, and performance baselines are validated and measurable.


**Qualifications for the role:**
- 15\\+ years of experience in Quality Engineering, including 3â€“5 years in a lead or architect role.

- Demonstrated experience in platform/IIoT or industrial software solutions, ABB, Honeywell, AspenTech, GE Digital.

- Demonstrated knowledge in creating testing strategies, ensuring quality governance, developing automation frameworks, and establishing teams focused on quality engineering.

- Comprehensive knowledge of CI/CD integration using tools such as Azure DevOps, Jenkins, and GitHub Actions.

- Practical involvement with automation tools and validation frameworks (PyTest, Playwright, JMeter, SQL/KQL) along with comprehension of industrial data flows (DataOps, Edge, OT/IT adapters, IAM security).

- Knowledge of security and compliance standards, combined with effective leadership and cross\\-functional collaboration skills to engage senior stakeholders.

 Delivered measurable outcomes including \\>90% QE automation coverage, 100% governance adoption, \\<3% defect leakage, higher first\\-time\\-right percentages, and consistent on\\-time release certification.
   

  

  

**More About Us**
 Our R\\&D engineers and scientists develop breakthrough technologies and products that change the way the world works and industries do business. We consistently explore new boundaries in technology, while retaining our focus on delivering solid returns for our customers and shareholders
   

  

 We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe.
   

  

**Fraud Warning:** 
 Any genuine offer from ABB will always be preceded by a formal application and interview process.
   

  

 We never ask for money from job applicants.
   

  

 For current open positions you can visit our career website https://global.abb/group/en/careers and apply.
   

  

 Please refer to detailed recruitment fraud caution notice using the link https://global.abb/group/en/careers/how\\-to\\-apply/fraud\\-warning.

title: Structural Design Engineer
description:
We are looking for a motivated and detail\\-oriented
 **Structure Design Engineer** 
 to join our dynamic team. This position is ideal for candidates with a background in structural engineering, specifically in Post\\-Tensioning and AutoCAD design. The role offers extensive learning opportunities and the chance to work on innovative and challenging projects.
 


**Key Responsibilities:** 

**1\\. Drafting \\& Detailing (Trainee Engineer â€“ 0\\-6 Months):**

* Forming Plan
* Beam Reinforcement
* Slab Reinforcement
* PT Layout
* C.G.S Drawing
* Slab Area \\& Beam Length Drawings

* Perform Quantity Estimation for tendons, anchorages, ducts, reinforcement, and concrete volumes.



**2\\. Design \\& Modelling (Trainee Engineer):**

**4\\. Responsibilities (Up to 3 Years Experience):**

* Participate in internal coordination meetings and track follow\\-up actions.

description:
IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa)
   

  

 India
   

  

 LIXIL INDIA PVT LTD

 Fully remote possible
   

  

 Full Time

**Position Title** 
 : Senior Application Specialist OTC
 **Department** 
 : IT/Digital â€“ OTC
   

  

**Career Path Level:** 
 Senior Reports to: Workstream Leader
   

  

**Position Purpose**
 The Senior Application specialist plays a key role in ensuring the stability, quality, and strategic evolution of IT systems and processes. With significant experience and deep domain knowledge, the Senior Application specialist takes ownership of complex technical or functional areas, mentors less experienced colleagues, and drives solution design and continuous improvement initiatives. This role serves as a bridge between operational execution and architectural thinking, providing leadership within projects and a trusted point of contact for business or technical counterparts.
   

  

**Position Summary:** 
 As a Senior Application specialist, you are a recognized expert in your IT domain. You independently manage and deliver complex initiatives, resolve critical issues, and ensure that solutions align with business needs and IT standards. Your work is both hands\\-on and strategic: balancing delivery with system improvement, business engagement, and peer development. Collaboration across functions, regions, and stakeholder groups is essential to your role.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Take proactive ownership of complex system areas, developments, or processes with minimal supervision within your area of expertise, cross functionally and together with internal and external stakeholders.
* Serve as subject matter expert in your domain; provide advanced support and solution guidance
* Design, implement, and optimize processes or system changes aligned with strategic goals and based on business objectives, user needs, and regulatory requirements.
* Mentor and support junior and mid\\-level colleagues through structured guidance and coaching.
* Actively contribute to project planning, scoping, and design activities; represent IT in business\\-facing discussions.
* Ensure adherence to industry and system standards, documentation, and compliance requirements.


**General Requirements**
* Masterâ€™s degree in System Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field
* Minimum of eight years hands\\-on experience in your field of expertise.
* Proven ability to lead complex initiatives independently, such as large scale projects and drive results.
* Demonstrated leadership in process improvement, problem\\-solving, or technical advancement.
* Strong communication skills in English, both verbal and written; able to clearly convey technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Ability to collaborate effectively in cross\\-functional and international teams.
* Can support and mentor others and contribute to team development and knowledge sharing. Growth Expectations:


 Senior Application specialists are expected to demonstrate influence beyond their immediate team, consistently deliver high\\-quality outcomes, and take initiative in strategic or cross\\-team programs. Growth from Senior to Solution Architect is marked by a shift from deep expertise to broader architectural vision, proactive business engagement, and a leadership role in shaping future IT solutions.

title: Biomedical AI Methods Expert
description:
**Summary**
 Novartis has embraced a bold strategy to drive a company\\-wide digital transformation. Our objective is to position Novartis as an industry leader by proactively adopting digital technologies that foster innovative approaches to hasten drug discovery and development. By utilizing both internal and external Research \\& Development data with the power of data science, predictive models, generative AI, and machine learning, our objective is to identify new targets, create more effective therapeutic molecules, better predict drug pharmacokinetics and safety risks, refine clinical trial design, and significantly shorten development cycles. The Artificial Intelligence \\& Computational Sciences (AICS) team leads Biomedical Research (BR) in exploring and applying advanced AI and ML methodologies to generate novel drug discovery insights, and to speed and improve drug discovery efficiency whilst focusing on patientsâ€™ needs.
   

  

 AICS partners with drug discovery teams, raises the level of AI expertise across BR and ensures that BR science keeps up with the rapidly evolving ecosystem of AI technologies by connecting with AI leaders in academia and industry.
   

  

 This roleâ€¯withinâ€¯theâ€¯AI Methodsâ€¯group of AICS will be tasked with critical assessment of the model landscape, identifying opportunities for methodological innovation, and building the right AI approaches, algorithms, models and workflows to maximize impact on key domains areas of biomedical research that will potentially lead to developing better drugs, faster.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 About the Role
   

  

* Work with a team of AI researchers, data scientists and SMEs with core domain expertise to develop and deliver focused, robust, performant AI algorithms and solutions to accelerate drug discovery.
* Stay informed about the latest AI methods, increase understanding of the problem domain, and ask detailed questions to identify potential areas for innovation in AI across the drug discovery pipeline.
* Promote awareness of advancements in AI methods for addressing key research questions within biomedical research.
* Fluently adopt Engineering and Product Development resources to ensure the adoption of AI solutions.
* Help position AI\\-aided drug discovery contributions to deliver and support progress of BRâ€™s portfolio, enable new kinds of therapeutic discoveries, shorten cycle times, and increase efficiency.


**Collaboration \\& partnership**
* A respectful, team\\-player attitude is an absolute must.
* Regularly communicate, engage, align with AICS teams, broader data science community, and senior scientists.
* Initiate and lead key high\\-value internal collaborations across BR.
* Help design translatable metrics for AI models that will lead to tangible impact in collaboration with BR DAs and FAs.
* Collaborate cross\\-functionally to translate model outputs into actionable hypotheses and guide experimental design.


**What Youâ€™ll Bring To The Role**
* 4\\+ years of significant experience in innovation, development, deployment and continuous support of Machine Learning and modeling.
* Strong hands\\-on coding proficiency in Python and deep learning frameworks and an expertise in bringing advanced analytics insights and actions to a large research organization
* Wide exposure to representation learning, deep generative modeling, probabilistic reasoning, and explainability approaches. with a deep passion for understanding and explaining the technical concepts underlying ML approaches.
* Strong understanding and experience in using version control systems for developing software (e.g. GitHub, git, subversion, bitbucket, etc.) with expertise in large\\-scale model training, distributed computation, and foundation model adaptation.
* Publications, patents, or open\\-source contributions that demonstrate machine learning innovation and expertise, with passion for understanding emerging technologies and how they can integrate into business solutions
* Ability to balance requirements, manage expectations, and drive effective results using a proactive can\\-do attitude towards identifying and resolving issues, as well as a proven ability to work exceptionally well within complex matrixed teams.
* A deep curiosity and passion for biomedical sciences driven therapeutic discovery.


**Nice To Have**
* Experience with applying ML to one or more functional areas of core drug discovery like target identification, computational chemistry, protein structure modelling and design or translational medicine is a plus.


**Commitment To Diversity \\& Inclusion**

Please include the job requisition number in your message.
   

  

**Relevant Areas Of Desired Expertise**
 Transformer architectures (Text, Vision, DNA/amino\\-acid sequences, Gene expression vectors);â€¯Long\\-context transformersâ€¯andâ€¯efficient attention mechanisms; diffusion models;â€¯flow matching;â€¯energy\\-based models; multimodal architectures; graph neural networks; geometric deep learning; Bayesian optimization; Reinforcement learning; Active learning; Variational Inference; Self\\-supervised learning; Contrastive learning; Domain adaption; Test\\-time adaptation

title: Senior Specialist - Architecture
description:
Versatile General Software Engineer to help build and scale the foundational AI infrastructure powering nextgeneration productivity tools across the enterprise Youll work closely with crossfunctional teams to design and implement a middlewareorchestration layer that connects lowcodenocode workflows with large language models LLMs This layercore to our platform known as Reefis essential for routing and processing AIpowered requests securely and efficiently
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

 Design develop and maintain services in Nodejs and Python that serve as orchestration and middleware for AI workflows
   

  

 Build scalable secure APIs and services that connect internal tools LLMs and workflow automation platforms like n8nio
   

  

 Collaborate with technical analysts AI specialists and platform teams to integrate diverse AI capabilities into consistent workflows
   

  

 Contribute to architecture discussions around service orchestration message routing and LLM integration
   

  

 Create and manage reusable components that ensure requests from chatbots or other tools are properly routed to the correct models
   

  

 Support custom service development to manage prompts context enrichment caching and result handling from LLMs
   

  

 Help evolve the Reef platforms backend logic to support broader use cases across teams
   

  

**Qualifications**
 3 to 6 years of software engineering experience in a backend role
   

  

 Proficiency with Nodejs and Python in production environments
   

  

 Experience working with AILLM APIs eg OpenAI Azure OpenAI Anthropic etc
   

  

 Familiarity with lowcodenocode tools especially n8nio Zapier or similar orchestration frameworks
   

  

 Understanding of RESTful APIs webhooks eventdriven systems and microservices architecture
   

  

 Strong debugging logging and observability practices
   

  

 Comfortable collaborating with technical product managers and AIMLfocused teams
   

  

 Bonus Points
   

  

 Experience designing or managing middleware or API gateway solutions
   

  

 Prior work in conversational AI platforms or intelligent chat interfaces
   

  

 Familiarity with vector databases semantic search or prompt engineering
   

  

 Background in developer experience DevEx or platform engineering
   

  

 This job is provided by Shine.com

title: n8n workflow automations specialist
description:
**Applications without a completed interview via Hireflix will not be processed/considered.**

  





 To apply: complete interview on Hireflix https://app.hireflix.com/public\\-application/694f6a6ead3243c3d63212ee
 



  





 I'm looking for an experienced n8n specialist to build and maintain automated workflows for a growing investment consultancy.
 


**The Role**

 You'll help streamline operations by creating reliable automations across our tech stack â€” from lead capture through to client management and reporting.
 


**What You'll Work On**

 Lead capture and CRM automations. Notification workflows for new leads, follow\\-ups, and reminders. Integrations between Zoho CRM, WhatsApp/Telegram, email, calendar, and Google Sheets. Document tracking and reminder sequences. Reporting dashboards and activity tracking.
 


**Example Project**

 We need a workflow to automate candidate screening from LinkedIn job posts â€” pulling applications, filtering against criteria, scoring candidates, and updating a tracker automatically.
 


**Requirements**

 Proven experience building n8n workflows (please share examples). Solid understanding of webhooks and APIs. Experience with Zoho CRM. Clear documentation practices. Reliable and responsive communication.
 


**Nice to Have**

 Experience with Make or Zapier. WhatsApp Business API or Telegram bot experience. LinkedIn API or scraping experience.
 



 This could become ongoing work as needs evolve.
